summary: Eight people are invited to their old high school for their ten-year reunion where a fellow former student, disfigured from a prank gone wrong, is out to seek revenge.
cast: Caroline Munro|Simon Scuddamore|Carmine Iannaccone|Donna Yeager|Gary Martin|Billy Hartman|Michael Safran|John Segal|Kelly Baker|Sally Cross|Josephine Scandi|Marc Smith|Dick Randall|Jon Clark|Mark Ezra
keywords: male full frontal nudity|murder of a nude woman|high school|slasher|breasts
director: Directors: George Dugdale, Mark Ezra | 1 more credit »
title: El día de los inocentes
